articles.description: How can coronavirus affect the brain? The BBC’s medical correspondent investigates.
articles.content:
Image caption
 Consultant neurologist Arvind Chandratheva points out brain damage on a scan
Stroke, delirium, anxiety, confusion, fatigue - the list goes on. If you think Covid-19 is just a respira… [+7241 chars]
